title: Katie Holmes and Suri wear matching cream sweaters as they take their dogs for a walk in New York
text:
As a single mother, she and her daughter are very close.

And on Sunday, Katie Holmes looked stylish as she and Suri walked their dogs in New York City.

The mother-daughter duo coordinated perfectly in cozy cream sweaters.

Autumn style: On Sunday, Katie Holmes, 40, looked stylish as she and Suri, 13, walked their dogs in New York City

Katie layered her knit outerwear over a collared top.

The 40-year-old added a pair of trendy, fitted trousers with a set of high heeled boots. She accessorized with a blue handbag and shades.

Suri, 13, paired her sweater with bell bottom jeans and pink sneakers.

Matching: The mother-daughter duo coordinated perfectly in cozy cream sweaters

Katie recently came out of a six-year relationship with ex-boyfriend, Jamie Foxx.

The duo reportedly split over the actor's alleged cheating with multiple women throughout the course of their relationship.

In an interview with Us Weekly, Jamie's ex-costar, Garcelle Beauvais, confirmed that the actor is indeed single.

Moving on: Katie recently came out of a six-year relationship with ex-boyfriend, Jamie Foxx, 51

'...He's also single!' she noted, after telling the site that Jamie congratulated her on joining the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.

'We're like brother and sister. We really are. Like, I've seen him go from party boy bachelor to a really great dad and, you know, we hang out with my kids, his kids, so it's really beautiful.'

She also admitted that she does 'find him incredibly sexy' and that the two 'have insane chemistry.'
